biotools.summary: MPDB 2.0 contains more than 500 indigenous medicinal plants of Bangladesh. It encompasses the plants scientific name, family name, local names, utilized parts, active compounds and the PubMed IDs of related articles.

bioschemas.name: MPDB 2.0
